jparsec.astrophysics

Class SingleDish

  • java.lang.Object
    • jparsec.astrophysics.SingleDish

  • public class SingleDish
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides useful calculations for single dish antennas.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    T. Alonso Albi - OAN (Spain)

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Field Detail

      • diameter

        public double diameter
        Antenna diameter in m.

      • aperEff

        public double aperEff
        Aperture efficiency.

      • elev

        public double elev
        Source elevation in radians. Useless for a space telescope.

      • tau

        public double tau
        Atmospheric opacity at zenit. Set to zero for a space telescope.

      • name

        public java.lang.String name
        Telescope name.

      • SingleDish

        public SingleDish(SingleDish.TELESCOPE id)
           throws JPARSECException
        Constructor for a given telescope.
        Parameters:
        id - The telescope ID constant.
        Throws:

    • Method Detail

      • setData

        public void setData(java.lang.String[] data)
        Sets the telescope data as the content of a file in the CASSIS software format.
        Parameters:
        data - The data for the telescope.

      • getJyKInTa

        public double getJyKInTa(double freq)
        Returns the K to Jy transform coefficient in antenna temperature. Antenna diameter, source elevation, opacity, and aperture efficiency must be defined.
        Parameters:
        freq - Frequency in GHz.
        Returns:
        The K to Jy transform coefficient.

      • getJyKInTmb

        public double getJyKInTmb(double freq)
                   throws JPARSECException
        Returns the K to Jy transform coefficient in main beam temperature.
        Parameters:
        freq - Frequency in GHz.
        Returns:
        The K to Jy transform coefficient.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • getBeamEfficiency

        public double getBeamEfficiency(double freq)
                         throws JPARSECException
        Returns the beam efficiency for a given frequency. This factor (beff) can be used to transform emission given in antenna temperature (Ta) to main beam temperature (Tmb) with the formula Tmb = Ta / beff.
        Parameters:
        freq - Frequency in GHz.
        Returns:
        The beam efficiency.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • getTmbFromTb

        public static double getTmbFromTb(double Tb,
                  double fwhmSource,
                  double fwhmBeam)
        Returns main beam brightness temperature from brightness temperature.
        Parameters:
        Tb - Brightness temperature.
        fwhmSource - Source solid angle.
        fwhmBeam - Main beam solid angle.
        Returns:
        The main beam temperature.

      • getTbFromTmb

        public static double getTbFromTmb(double Tmb,
                  double fwhmSource,
                  double fwhmBeam)
        Returns brightness temperature from main beam brightness temperature.
        Parameters:
        Tmb - Main beam brightness temperature.
        fwhmSource - Source solid angle.
        fwhmBeam - Main beam solid angle.
        Returns:
        The brightness temperature.

      • getBeam

        public double getBeam(double freq)
        Returns the beam size.
        Parameters:
        freq - Frequency in GHz.
        Returns:
        Beam size in arcseconds.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        A test program.
        Parameters:
        args - Unused.
